field.name: notes
field.placeholder: An administrator can set up default Terms and conditions in your Company settings.

button.name: action_set_date_planned
button.string: Set date to all order lines
button.help: This changes the scheduled date of all order lines to the given date

field.name: help
field.p: Click to create a quotation that will be converted into a purchase order.

Use this menu to search within your purchase orders by references, vendor, products, etc. For each purchase order, you can track the related discussion with the vendor, control the products received and control the vendor bills.

field.name: help
field.p: Click to create a request for quotation.
The quotation contains the history of the discussion/negotiation you had with your vendor. Once confirmed, a request for quotation is converted into a purchase order.
Most propositions of purchase orders are created automatically by Odoo based on inventory needs.

field.name: help
field.p: Click to add a contact in your address book.
Odoo helps you easily track all activities related to a customer: discussions, history of business opportunities, documents, etc.

field.name: help
field.p: Click to add a contact in your address book.
Odoo helps you easily track all activities related to a supplier: discussions, history of purchases, documents, etc.

tree.decoration-success: qty_done==product_qty and state!='done' and not result_package_id

field.name: note
field.placeholder: Add an internal note that will be printed on the Picking Operations sheet

field.name: help
field.p: Click here to create a new transfer.
You can either do it immediately or mark it as Todo for future processing. Use your scanner to validate the transferred quantity quicker.
